snippet.title: Mythic Crusade // Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the Game ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/2872520/Mythic_Crusade/

Explore, gain resources, expand your town, recruit armies, fight infidels, find new spells, learn skills, and find powerful artifacts. Create your unique build and reclaim the Mythic Holy Land.

Developed by
Sepnax
